name: Chill Mini Golf
description:
Welcome to Chill Mini Golf. 

A short mini-golf game.

Relax & play ;)

HOW TO PLAY

Use your mouse to navigate through the menus.
Left click & Drag and drop when hovering the ball to shoot.

Left click & Drag to move the camera around when your cursor is not on the ball.

HOW TO WIN

Complete all 10 levels to win the game :)

Each level must be completed under the specified number of shots !

Hope you enjoy !

PS : For better quality and performance, don't hesitate to download the windows version. Simply click Download, unzip,  and then launch the .exe provided :)
